channel.title: Too much Delta
channel.description: I miss the old allstar source servers, now Deltascape has taken over rsps pretty much and most servers nowadays are Delta sources. I hate the differences of programming between delta and regular servers. Idk why but it just pisses me off. Why can't we all go back to 317 silab client servers?

item.title: Too much Delta
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

Chassy13:

Everyone is obsessed with DeltaScape because of the features already made on the source. It provides a decent base for both a client and a server, but it really is overrated. Other wL servers really aren’t the best either. I would rather have everyone swtich to 508+ unless they have a very decent source in 317.

474, epic,classic rs ftw

Read full topic

item.title: Too much Delta
item.dc:creator: @Bow_To_Me Bow To Me
item.description:
@Bow_To_Me wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:11, topic:294940”]What’s wrong with delta? It’s only bad when it’s put into the wrong hands.

I think it’s Mitko, and someone else, I can’t think of his name atm, they’re really good Delta coders. Delta isn’t bad, it’s the noobs that hardly edit it that make it bad.[/quote]
Delta is poorly programmed and very inefficient, but, it is actually quite stable.

Read full topic

item.title: Too much Delta
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I’m really not that great of a programmer, :P. I understand the basics, but I am going to read some Java docs pretty soon.

If you ask me, 508 is pretty much the same. The only difference is a 508 is much more organized. It uses different classes and variables to keep it clean. 317s have everything cluttered into the client class and NPCHandler class(unless changed otherwise), while 508s have a class for almost every different thing. The max size of a file in my 508 is around 80KB or so, which is playerCombat and files like that.

Read full topic

Everyone is obsessed with DeltaScape because of the features already made on the source. It provides a decent base for both a client and a server, but it really is overrated. Other wL servers really aren’t the best either. I would rather have everyone swtich to 508+ unless they have a very decent source in 317.
[/quote]
I don’t like 508+. :|[/quote]
I think the reason chassy likes 508+ is because he’s a good programmer. I, on the other hand, am sort of a good programmer. But only with 317s

Read full topic
